Product Development+Engineering+Testing.EXPLANATION: Measures the percentage of planned tests that are completed within the test schedule.
Product Development+Engineering+Testing.FORMULA: (Number of Completed Tests / Total Number of Tests Planned) * 100

Product Development+Engineering+Testing.EXPLANATION: Measures the average time taken to complete all planned tests for a product or design.
Product Development+Engineering+Testing.FORMULA: Total Time Spent on Testing / Number of Tests Completed

Product Development+Engineering+Testing.EXPLANATION: Measures the percentage of defects identified during the testing phase.
Product Development+Engineering+Testing.FORMULA: (Number of Defects Detected / Total Units Tested) * 100

Product Development+Engineering+Testing.EXPLANATION: Measures how well actual testing costs adhere to the budgeted costs.
Evaluates the extent to which testing covers all aspects of the product or design.
Product Development+Engineering+Testing.FORMULA: (Number of Test Cases Executed / Total Test Cases Planned) * 100

Product Development+Engineering+Testing.EXPLANATION: Measures the percentage of validation tests that meet all requirements.
Product Development+Engineering+Testing.FORMULA: (Number of Successful Validations / Total Validations Attempted) * 100

Product Development+Engineering+Testing.EXPLANATION: Measures the percentage of tests that need to be repeated or corrected due to initial failures.
Product Development+Engineering+Testing.FORMULA: (Number of Reworked Test Cases / Total Test Cases) * 100

Product Development+Engineering+Testing.EXPLANATION: Measures the average customer satisfaction score with the products after testing.
Product Development+Engineering+Testing.FORMULA: (Sum of Customer Satisfaction Ratings for Tested Products / Number of Customers)
